description:
As Tosaki takes charge of the government`s search for the new Ajin, Kei and Kaito are attacked by thugs who are eager to claim the reward money.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Dlaczego to się dzieje? Dlaczego ja…
Nande Konna Koto ni Nattanda. Boku wa Warukunai no ni
Pourquoi ? J`ai rien fait de mal !
Why Is This Happening? Why Me...
何でこんなことになったんだ. 僕は悪くないのに
왜 이렇게 된걸까. 난 아무 잘못 없는데
